item.title: About
item.description: Brandon is a marketing and communications professional who works in the—often chaotic—world of ideas. Seeing communication as central to the challenges of our time, Brandon seeks to build communities through an empathic approach, deeper understanding, and targeted messaging. item.title: CV
item.description: Experience # Senior Manager, Marketing & Communications 2024-05 - present Northwestel Directed marketing campaign strategy to build value in the customer lifecycle. Developed processes to substantially reduce onboarding time and foster collaboration. Managed the marketing team to deliver on targets and commitments to stakeholders. Redefined the marketing mix with a greater focus on local media and in-community ad placements. Marketing Manager 2023-03 - 2024-05 Northwestel Pitched and led the implementation of marketing automation to improve user experience and grow new product lines with real-time emails and SMS based on interaction data.
